scripts.tauri:dev: env -u SNAP -u SNAP_NAME -u SNAP_DATA -u SNAP_COMMON -u SNAP_REVISION LD_PRELOAD=/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 TAURI_DIR=./src-tauri npx tauri dev
scripts.dev:app: npm run dev && echo "Start Tauri in another terminal: npm run tauri:dev"
scripts.dev:live: env -u SNAP -u SNAP_NAME -u SNAP_DATA -u SNAP_COMMON -u SNAP_REVISION LD_PRELOAD=/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 TAURI_DIR=./src-tauri npx tauri dev
